results.title: [Anti-RNA polymerase III antibodies in scleroderma renal crisis].
results.text_hl: The positive analysis of anti-RNA polymerase III antibodies confirmed the clinical suspicion of @DISEASE_Scleroderma_Systemic @DISEASE_MESH:D012595 @@@scleroderma renal crisis@@@ in the setting of first diagnosis of @DISEASE_Scleroderma_Systemic @DISEASE_MESH:D012595 @@@systemic sclerosis@@@. @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Second_Primary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016609 @@@TREATMENT@@@ AND COURSE: After diagnosis therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ and amlodipin was established.

citations.NLM: Schorn R, Gaspert A, Cohen CD. [Anti-RNA polymerase III antibodies in scleroderma renal crisis]. Dtsch Med Wochenschr. 2010 Jun;135(22):1118-21. PMID: 20503137
